questions.text: What is Augmented Reality (AR) in an industrial context?
options: Overlapping computer-generated information onto the real world

questions.text: Which of the following is a primary use case for AR in industrial maintenance?
options: Providing remote expert assistance and displaying step-by-step instructions
Ordering lunch for the maintenance crew

questions.text: How does Virtual Reality (VR) differ from Augmented Reality (AR)?
options: VR overlays digital info on the real world, while AR creates a fully immersive virtual environment
AR overlays digital info on the real world, while VR creates a fully immersive virtual environment
VR uses glasses, while AR uses a headset
questions.correctAnswer: AR overlays digital info on the real world, while VR creates a fully immersive virtual environment

questions.text: What is a key application of VR in Industry 4.0?
options: Real-time monitoring of live factory operations
Training employees on complex machinery in a safe, simulated environment
questions.correctAnswer: Training employees on complex machinery in a safe, simulated environment
